author: Reuters
title: Stock futures tumble as coronavirus crisis intensifies and Trump warns of ‘very, very painful’ two weeks
description: Stark predictions of a rising U.S. death toll and economic damage from the coronavirus outbreak
content:
U.S. stock index futures sank on Wednesday following stark predictions of a rising U.S. death toll and economic damage from the coronavirus outbreak, a day after the S&P 500 ended its worst quarter since the 2008 financial crisis.
President Donald Trump … [+1117 chars]
